00242        // det = signed determinant of Jacobian Matrix at a Vertex
00243        // delta = scaling parameter
00244      static inline double vertex_barrier_function(double det, double delta) 
00245             { return 0.5*(det+sqrt(det*det+4*delta*delta)); }
